title: SonicWall Firewall - Firewall and Firewall Settings
description: This dashboard provides information about the Firewall and Firewall Settings logs generated in SonicWall Firewall.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides insights on Firewall and Firewall Setting logs.
- Firewall logs include logs related to the application firewall and security policies.
- Firewall Settings include logs for flood attacks, FTP, multicast, and so on.

definition.title: Total Firewall and Firewall Setting Events
Total Events by Priority Over Time
Total Number of Access Rules Added
Total Number of Access Rules Deleted
Top Source IP: Packet Drops Due to Connection Limit
Top Destination IP: Packet Drops Due to Connection Limit
Total Events by Priority Over Time
Multicast UDP Packets Dropped Over Time
Top Blacklisted Machines from SYN Flood
Top Blacklisted Machines from TCP Flood
Top Blacklisted Machines from RST Flood
Top Blacklisted Machines from FIN Flood
Failed Login By FTP Client User
